@usedefaults

{{aysjob: jobid:$$jobid runid:$$runid reponame:$$reponame}}

{{cssstyle
    .CodeMirror {
        position: relative;
        left: 7%;
    }
}}

{{breadcrumb:
    - Repositories: /ays81/repos
    - Repo $$reponame: /ays81/Repo?reponame=$$reponame
    - Runs: /ays81/Runs?repo=$$reponame
    - Run $$runid: /ays81/RunModel?reponame=$$reponame&runid=$$runid
    - Job $$jobid:
}}
{% if error is defined %}
Error : ${error}
{% else %}
h3. Job $$jobid:

* *Action*:
    ** Actor name: ${job.actor_name}
    ** Action name: ${job.action_name}
    ** code:
    {{code:
${job.code}
    }}
** args: ${job.args}
** debug: ${job.debug}
** lastModDate: ${job.lastModDate}
* *Logs*:
{{code:
${job.printLogs}
}}
{% if job.profileData -%}
    * [See job cProfile|/ays81/jobprofile?jobid=${job.key}]
{% endif %}
{% endif %}
